introduction.title: 亲爱的执政官
introduction.content:
欢迎你来到这里使用此模拟规划工具，在这里你可以通过绘制六边形来完成冰霜荒地的初步规划。
在这个冰汽时代，谨慎选择和深思熟虑将为人民们获得光明温暖的未来。
introduction.content_en:
Welcome to the Governor Academy and this simulation planning tool. Here, you can create an initial plan for the Frostlands by drawing hexagons.
In this Frostpunk era, cautious choices and thoughtful deliberation will lead your people to a bright and warm future.

donation.title: 执政官的支持
donation.content:
维护服务器和域名不易，代码开发也是纯粹为爱发电。
希望善良的执政官能够赞善捐助此网站的运行。
祝英勇无畏的执政官，暖气满屋，落汗冰原，徒手搏熊。
donation.content_en:
Maintaining servers and domains is no easy task, and code development is driven purely by passion.
We hope kind-hearted governors can donate to support the operation of the Governor Academy.
Wishing you, the brave and fearless governor, a warm house, sweat on the icy plains, and the strength to wrestle bears with bare hands.

additional.title: 开发工作一览
additional.content:
如果你喜欢这个工具并希望支持我们的持续开发，请考虑使用下方的赞赏码或收款码给予支持。
非常感谢你的帮助！

已经开发:
· 数据存储和导入 - 能够完整地留住信息
· 执政官作品画廊 - 展示执政官的杰作
后续开发目标：
· 建筑物引入 - 更多样模拟方式
· 泰森多边形 - 有四边形、五边形、七边形
· 劳动力和材料计算 - 更加高效的算法
additional.content_en:
If you like this tool and want to support our ongoing development, please consider using the appreciation code or payment code below to contribute.
Thank you very much for your support!

Features already developed:
· Data Storage and Import - Preserve information completely
· Governor Works Gallery - Showcase the masterpieces of governors
Future Development Goals:
· Building Integration - More diverse simulation methods
· Voronoi Diagrams - Include quadrilaterals, pentagons, and heptagons
· Labor and Material Calculations - More efficient algorithms
